events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations and I would like to return it.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting to return the product and get money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and assist the customer with the return process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund. I'm here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund request so I can assist you more efficiently?
My order number is 987654321. The item arrived in good condition but it doesnâ€™t fit the description, so I would like to return it.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process and sent you a prepaid return shipping label via email to send the item back.
Thanks for the quick response and for sending the return label. I will send the item back today.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since there has been no further communication, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting us, and have a great day!
